name: The Dead Vote
description:
System: Custom

Type: Stand-alone game

Genre: Political, horror, humor, satire?

Mechanics: Single die roll using d6

Intended Players: Campaign Manager + Candidates (1-4)

Supplies needed: d6

Setup time: 5-15 minutes.

Session time: Up to the Campaign Manager, but probably 2-4 hours.

License: CC-BY 4.0

Included Bonuses: Campaign Ads

Last Updated: July 26, 2022

Legal Disclaimer: All similarities to figures living or dead are purely coincidental. Loreshaper Games is not affiliated with any political campaign.
